name: Vengeance Below
description:
Vengeance Below is a game we created in our Game Design 3 class. The premise of the game is that you are betrayed by someone you love and are sent to Hell. We are extremely happy with how this came out! Please let us know how we did, and if there's anything we can improve on! :)

WARNING: This is intended to be a rage game. 

Note: The sound takes a second to start, but I'm trying to figure out what's going on.. I'm also going to create a better cover picture. :)

Who did what:

Michaela: Coding, main characters, bunny, snake-creature.

Eric: Level design.

Spencer: Blob-creature, floating wisp-creature, skulls, head on spikes, roasting baby, the Devil.

Richard: Idle demon, treasure chest, crawler, shadow-man, throne.

Zachary: Music, SFX.
